title: Linux Install Fest
about: ALiAS organized a successful Linux Install Fest for first-year students, enriching the tech community with hands-on open-source experience.

title: Kickstarter
about: ALiAS orchestrated "Kickstarter," an event where freshers introduced students to diverse technology domains and coding strategies.

title: Git Mania I
about: This event turned our tech enthusiasts into Git masters, blending interactive learning and hands-on sessions.
